title: You Bring Great Evil (1C283)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Plays on a companion (except an Elf). While at a sanctuary, bearer cannot heal.
Lore:	”'And what is this? We have not had dealings with the Dwarves since the Dark Days.'”
Rarity:	C
